name: maestro
description: Multi-agent development orchestration platform â€” 12 specialists, 4-phase orchestration, parallel dispatch, persistent sessions, and standalone review/debug/security/perf commands

settings.name: Default Model
settings.description: Override the model for parallel-dispatched agents (e.g., gemini-2.5-pro). Sequential subagent delegation inherits the main session model.

settings.name: Writer Model
settings.description: Override the model for the technical_writer agent in parallel dispatch only.

settings.name: Temperature
settings.description: Override the temperature for all agent delegation prompts (0.0-2.0).

settings.name: Max Agent Turns
settings.description: Maximum number of turns per agent invocation.

settings.name: Agent Timeout
settings.description: Timeout in minutes for each agent invocation.

settings.name: Disabled Agents
settings.description: Comma-separated list of agent names to exclude from implementation planning.

settings.name: Max Retries
settings.description: Maximum retry attempts per phase before escalating to user.

settings.name: Auto Archive
settings.description: Automatically archive session state on successful completion (true/false).

settings.name: State Directory
settings.description: Base directory for session state and plans (default: .gemini).

settings.name: Max Concurrent
settings.description: Maximum agents running simultaneously in parallel dispatch (0 = unlimited).

settings.name: Extra CLI Args
settings.description: Space-separated Gemini CLI flags forwarded to each parallel dispatch process (example: --sandbox --policy .gemini/policies/maestro.toml).

settings.name: Execution Mode
settings.description: Phase 3 dispatch mode: 'parallel' (concurrent agents), 'sequential' (one at a time), or 'ask' (prompt each time). Default: ask.
